column4: why would my new computer connect to the internet direct through the cable modem but wont work with the router
it is gigabit
wont ping through but connect ubuntu up to the cable modem and it works like a dream
other computers running ubuntu on the next work work fibe
no network experts
even tried ethtool -s eth0 speed 100
sounds like a dead port on the router
no works on other computer just pop out the cable and plug it in
then it should work on the computer that is having issues since it sounds like a router issue
but ifconfig shows no rx tx
does the computer in question have its ethernet seen>?
how do I check?
ifconfig -a you should see eth0 or something close to it
yeah eth0
I assigned a static ip
and the gateway is set but the router cant see it and wont communicate no pings even
well sounds like it's how you configured the machine most likely does dhcp work at all? just to rule something out
yes if directly connected to the cable modem
its a fresh install of hard heron
well directly connected to the cable modem using dhcp won't rule anything out with the router now will it
thanks got to go
